name: Picross Griddler
description:
Join a cast of adorable robots in the newest mind-boggling mobile puzzle game! Uncover simple and beautifully complex pixel art and test your wits against brain-racking picture logic puzzles.

Follows a cute and curious little robot on his quest to discover the world - one nonogram at a time. Nonograms are logic picture puzzles with simple rules yet challenging solutions. Fill out the necessary cells while following the number rules to reveal the image hidden in the puzzle! Start with simpler nonograms and pixel art and eventually move on to more complex portraits, completed by solving multiple complex nonograms.

Help Hanjie on his trip around town! Help him decipher the wonderful things that puzzles hold!

Features:
- Cool pixel art.
- Uniquely challenging puzzle gameplay
- Uncover colorful pictures by solving nonograms
- Solve multiple nonograms to complete bigger portraits
- Explore different environments with a handful of puzzles that gets harder as you progress.
- Meet cute and friendly characters that will help you on your journey.
- Rank up on Achievements and mark your success!

** Please note that this free app contains optional paid content that can be purchased with real money to enhance the gaming experience. You can disable in-app purchases by adjusting your device settings. **
